answers.answer: Welcome and congrats on the pregnancywhen they start you on insulin they start with not enough and work up to the correct does.  You do NOT want to do it the other way around (start with too much insulin and reduce to good BG numbers)  Tell the MD about your  BG numbers.Sory cant help with the nauseousness,  Probably not the insulin.I am NOT a doctor
Thanks, still helps what u said, is the first time in insulin and I hate it
Ive been on it for 14 years,  I am alive today because of it, so you do what you have to do.  I am thank full for it as the alternative is not good.

Hello,the dietician may have told you to eat lots of carbs.  This is the typical approach.  However, if you eat less carbs (and those you do eat should be from veges and dairy, and some fruits / complex and mostly unprocessed carbs).I had 2 successful diabetic pregnancies (on insulin) using low carb approach.  I found if I ate the amount of carbs they wanted me to (about 240 g/day), I would have gained an unreasonable amount of weight and also I would have had great trouble controlling blood sugars.Most important in pregnancy is to control blood sugar.  This is more important than eating lots of carbs.  Focus instead on meats, eggs, unsweetened, diary, protein, and low carb veges. Eat unprocessed fats (ie. cream, avocado, nuts, etc) for extra calories if you need them.Your insulin will need to be increased to control your blood sugars.  The dose of  insulin can also increase a lot during the pregnancy.  I went from about 20 units / day at the beginning to nearly 100 units/day at the end.

Wow I'm right now at 80 units, I'm not eating like they want me to because I'm always nauseous and not getting hungry, I'm in the weight that I was when I started, for my Dr's is ok because I'm obese, so I'm good with me not gaining weight for now

question: I'm 12 weeks pregnant with type 2 diabetes and I started to get insulin, and hate it, but the thing is that is getting higher, they increase the dose and is not working, I don't know what to do because I can't eat everything they told me to eat cause everything makes me nauseous, please help
title: First time here, hello
